attention1.ptxt: Before starting the following procedure, be sure to observe Precautions on Fuel System Service in order to reduce the risk or fire and personal injury.

s1.ptxt: Relieve fuel pressure in fuel feed line according to Fuel Pressure Relief Procedure .
Disconnect fuel pipe joint and fuel hose (3) from fuel pipe (2) at the front and rear of each fuel pipe referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting .
Mark the location of clamps (1) on fuel pipes (2) so that the clamps can be reinstalled to where they were.
Remove pipes (2) with clamp from vehicle.
Install clamps to white painted at pipes. If clamp is deformed, its claw is bent or broken, replace it with new one.
Install pipes with pipe clamps to vehicle.
Connect fuel hoses and pipes to each pipe referring to Fuel Hose Disconnecting and Reconnecting .
With engine OFF, turn ignition switch to ON position and check for fuel leaks.
